longBusinessSummary: Fitzroy Minerals Inc., a junior natural resource company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada, Chile, and Argentina. The company explores for copper, gold, and silver. It holds an option to acquire 100% interests in the Cariboo property located near Smithers, British Columbia, Canada; the Polimet Gold-Copper-Silver Project, comprising an area of 1,860 hectors of concessions located in the Valparaiso Region of Chile; the Taquetren silver project covering an area of 285 square kilometers located in the Navidad-Calcatreau mining district, Argentina; and the Caballos copper project covering an area of 18,000 hectors of concessions located in Valparaiso region, Chile. The company was formerly known as Norseman Silver Inc. and changed its name to Fitzroy Minerals Inc. in January 2024. Fitzroy Minerals Inc. was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
